description: Information a single microscope channel. Not required if codebook is used.
title: imaging_channel

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

channel_name.description: An identifier used for this channel within the experiment. This should align with the way channels are referenced in file_names or file manifests.

probe.description: The probe used for target detection.

target_molecule.description: The molecule targeted by the probe in this channel.

target_structure.description: The structure targeted by the probe in this channel.
